评论概述: Definitely recommend to wide calves girlies
评论详情: I was really hope they would fit my wide calves since I always have a problem in regular boots but they fit perfectly. Not too roomy and not tight either. I love the length and they are comfy. I recommend 😊

评论概述: Slouchy, formless boot legs and uncomfortable
评论详情: Boots were not as expected. The top edge of the boot leg had no stitching or seem and so the edge was not firm, clean cut or uniform all the way around the edge. The legs were like a floppy, formless, handbag. I was pretty surprised. The boot legs are not stiff at all and are baggy.  I am athletic, but have average calves. The legs were way too loose, compared to the pictures. The foot bed was very hard with basically no padding. There’s no way I could handle walking back and forth down an office hallway all day, walking a block down the street, shopping, or doing anything all day in these. I’m not sure why anyone would keep these boots unless they have low expectations of their footwear.

I will not just be using them for my Halloween costume lol but I will be sure to use them with some really cute outfits. The suede is soft. They were a perfect fit with a little room left in the toe area for thick socks if you want to wear some. My feet usually hurt so bad in heels, but these did not bother me at all. They are comfortable fashionable and super cute.
These boots are great I bought them for my wife she absolutely love them

I have problem feet and have to wear inserts with everything. Typically if I wear heels I can manage one day a week and spend the rest of the week regretting that decision.  Not so with these Dream Pair boots. Not only do my inserts fit perfectly, they have great ankle support so I don’t wobble around like a newborn giraffe, plenty of room in the toe box with the inserts in and my foot doesn’t slide forward down the heel.  I’ve worn them multiple days in a row and three times in the same week with no pain in my feet, legs or back, and that includes some city walking and hauling around a heavy backpack for school.  I have several Dream Pair shoes (sandals and pumps) and have never been disappointed. This is a go to brand for comfortable shoes.

These boots are almost perfect! They are cute, look high-quality, are so comfortable to stand in, and have a soft material. I was hoping for a height just below the knee so unfortunately will be returning these.

When I first received these boots I didn't love them. I have bigger calves so I think I wasn't feeling how they looked and felt on me. After wearing them a couple times though, they got more and more comfortable and now I really love how they look with fall and winter outfits! They have a sleek and sexy look, that looks very classy with the right outfit. Also looks great with jeans and elevates a casual look (pant legs worn over the boots, not tucked in).
